casebody.data:
In re: Andrea ADAMS, et al.
v.
ALLIED SHIPYARD, INC., et al. No: 2017-CC-2077
2017-CC-2079 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 2, 2018

Dear Counsel:

This is to advise that the Court took the following action on your Motions for Extension of Time in the above entitled matters.

GRANTED
